name: add_cost_per_area_to_unused_construction
display_name: Add Cost Per Area to Unused Construction

arguments.name: construction
arguments.display_name: Choose a Construction to Add Costs to

arguments.name: material_cost_ip
arguments.display_name: Material and Installation Costs for Construction per Area Used

arguments.name: demolition_cost_ip
arguments.display_name: Demolition Costs for Construction per Area Used

arguments.name: demo_cost_initial_const
arguments.display_name: Demolition Costs Occur During Initial Construction

arguments.name: om_cost_ip
arguments.display_name: O & M Costs for Construction per Area Used

name_xml: Add Cost per Area to Unused Construction
modeler_description_xml: The use case for this is a construction that is not used in the baseline but will be used after other measures are run. For example adding overhangs to the Building.
description_xml: This measure is the same as "Add Cost per Area to Construction" except that it only offers constructions that are not used on any surfaces in the baseline construction.
